backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing connection-gated forum threads, replies, and thread listing with access control and basic in‑memory state.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old and new actor data models and a migration function that initializes empty new‑format state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining light and dark butterfly‑themed OKLCH color palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, title, favicon, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration defining public and authenticated routes including connections thread detail pages.
frontend/src/backendExtensions.d.ts: TypeScript module augmentations adding future post, comment, and moderation APIs to the backend interface.
frontend/src/components/auth/AgeGate.tsx: Renders an age verification screen allowing users to confirm they are 18+, triggering an eligibility mutation and offering a logout option.
frontend/src/components/auth/BannedScree: Displays an account ban message with optional reason and provides a sign‑out button that redirects to the home page.
frontend/src/components/connections/Conn: Shows a list of connection threads with loading, empty, and error states, linking each thread to its detail page and supporting pagination.
frontend/src/components/connections/NewT: Provides a dialog-based form for creating new threads, validating input and submitting via a createThread mutation.
frontend/src/components/connections/Repl: Displays replies for a thread with loading, empty, and error states, showing author info and content for each reply.
Offers a reply form for a thread, validating content and submitting replies through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/helloCorner/Hell: Enables composing Hello Corner posts with text, photo, or video attachments, handling validation, previews, upload progress, and submission.
Renders a single Hello Corner message with avatar, content, media attachments, and like/dislike reactions. Handles fetching and updating reaction state via hooks.
Displays a list of messages with loading, error, empty-state handling, and a load‑more button. Maps each message to a HelloCornerMessageItem.
Provides like/dislike buttons with local reaction state and async handlers. Updates UI based on pending state and selected reaction.
Top-level Hello Corner section that displays the composer and paginated message list. Handles message creation and pagination offset.
Wraps authenticated app content, showing a loading screen or banned screen as needed. Provides main layout, nav bar, and footer.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Repor: Lists moderation reports with loading and error states and allows resolving individual reports. Displays report details including type and reason.
frontend/src/components/moderation/RoleM: Placeholder admin-only section indicating future moderator role management. Shows basic static UI only.
frontend/src/components/moderation/UserA: Allows admins to validate principals, view ban status, and ban or unban users. Includes inputs, validation, and calls to moderation hooks.
frontend/src/components/nav/AuthedNav.ts: Navigation bar for authenticated users with links, moderation visibility, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages avatar and profile photo selection, preview, validation, upload progress, and removal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity login/logout and exposes authentication state and principal info.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionsForum.t: Provides thread and reply queries and mutations for the Connections forum using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useHelloCorner.ts: Stubbed hooks for a Hello Corner feature returning placeholders and errors since backend is missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Provides React Query hooks for moderation actions, all implemented as stubs returning defaults or throwing errors due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains stubbed React Query hooks for eligibility, profiles, mentor browsing, and contacts, mostly returning defaults or throwing errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom light/dark theme color variables using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Connections.tsx: Displays a paginated list of connection threads with a composer for creating new threads.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectionsThreadDeta: Shows a single thread’s details and replies, with loading/error states and a reply composer.
frontend/src/pages/Directory.tsx: Renders the community directory page with a placeholder message for unavailable features.
frontend/src/pages/Feed.tsx: Displays the community feed page with a placeholder indicating the feature is unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Shows community guidelines using styled cards outlining rules and expectations.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, features overview, and login CTA using useAuth.
frontend/src/pages/Moderation.tsx: Moderation page displaying permissions-based access and placeholder moderation tools.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetail.tsx: Placeholder page for viewing a single post, showing temporarily unavailable message.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileMe.tsx: User profile management page with placeholder content indicating features are unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileView.tsx: Public profile view page showing placeholder content for viewing another user's profile.
frontend/src/utils/connectionsForumError: Normalizes forum-related errors into user-friendly messages based on error text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing features, requirements, and current application state.
